plot: George refuses to give anyone his secret code (BOSCO). Kramer buys a police scanner. Jerry does a series of ads for Leapin' Larry's Appliance Store. Elaine has dinner with J. Peterman but after she and Jerry bail on the dinner, George is stuck to dine with Peterman. George spills his secret code to Peterman's dying mother and gets in trouble for it.—halo1k

Elaine ropes Jerry and George into having dinner with her and her boss Peterman but after she and Jerry get out of it, George is left with him on his own. It all turns into a fiasco when Peterman learns that his mother is on her deathbed. Her last words are puzzling to him but not to George. Meanwhile, Kramer buys a police scanner and is convinced he can help the New York fire department select faster routes as they respond to alarms.—garykmcd
